description: Code review standards and PR requirements
rules: Sensitive areas require CODEOWNERS approval and may need two reviewers
Reviews should start within 2 business days
One intent per PR; feature-flags for risky changes
No code change without tests that fail before and pass after the change
No secrets/PII in code, comments, logs, tests, or fixtures
Include a rollback/disable plan for non-trivial changes
Include change management and impact assessment
Ensure compliance with all applicable constitutions
All changes must go through proper change control process
All code changes must include appropriate tests
New dependencies must pass license allowlist and CVE threshold
